name: Letter Category
description:
Letter Category This is some college-level vocabulary testing. A fun, challenging, game to name various categories that start with random letters within twenty seconds (Customizable Timer). Put your knowledge to the test and find out how much you actually know. Rules:

Word must be within the category and start with the letter provided.

Each letter of the word is counted as a point.

Words used more than once in a game will result in zero points.

If you choose to change the timer, setting it longer than twenty seconds will make the game not report your high score on the online scoreboard.

Double points specifics:

- Cities and Countries: More than 6 letters.

- Sports: More than 10 letters.

NOTE: THIS GAME IS UNDER CONSTRUCTION AT THE MOMENT, MORE CATEGORIES AND LETTERS TO COME IN FUTURE UPDATES. SINCE THIS GAME IS UNDER DEVELOPMENT, PLEASE REPORT ANY GLITCHES OR PROBLEMS.  LOGIN IS NECESSARY IF YOU WANT TO ACCESS THE ONLINE LEADERBOARD; LOGIN INFO IS SECURED ON AZURE PLAYFAB, A MICROSOFT COMPANY. IF YOU CONTINUE AS A GUEST YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO ACCESS THE SCOREBOARD.

Please give this game a rating or help however you want! Thank you for trying this game out!

When enough people are added to the leaderboard, it will be displayed HERE.
